metadata.title: CVE-2015-8001 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - low
metadata.description: The chunked upload API (ApiUpload) in MediaWiki before 1.23.11, 1.24.xbefore 1.24.4, and 1.25.x before 1.25.3 does not restrict the uploaded datato the claimed file size, which allows remote authenticated users to causea denial of service via a chunk that exceeds the file size.

criterions.comment: mediawiki: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
